alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 10:11AM CDT until August 10 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Tennessee... South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 7.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
